name: DREAMLINED
description:
Hello future DREAMLINE user!


DREAMLINED is a physics-based automation/destruction game about building machines and crushing dreams.



DREAMLINED takes place in an alternate universe where exceptional insights into the workings of the human mind were made before other technological advancements (such as the internet).



You have purchased a software/hardware bundle called DREAMLINE, which extracts all ambitions from your mind and allows you to view, edit, and organize them.
